settings.heading: Technical info
settings.content:
{%- if product.metafields.global.actuation.value -%}{%- endif -%}{%- if product.metafields.global.bottomout.value -%}{%- endif %} {%- if product.metafields.global.is_silenced.value -%}{%- endif %} {%- if product.metafields.my_fields.stem_type.value -%}{%- endif %} {%- if product.metafields.my_fields.housing_material_top_.value -%} {%- endif -%}
Operating Principle:{{ product.metafields.my_fields.operating_principle.value }}
Action:{{ product.metafields.global.action.value }}
Actuation Force:{{ product.metafields.global.actuation.value }} cN
Bottom-out Force:{{ product.metafields.global.bottomout.value }} cN
Bottom-out Force:{{ product.metafields.global.is_silenced.value }}
Stem Type:{{ product.metafields.my_fields.stem_type.value }}
Top:{%- if product.metafields.global.housingcolour.value -%}{%- endif -%}  {{ product.metafields.my_fields.housing_material_top_.value }} {%- endif %} {%- if product.metafields.my_fields.housing_material_bottom_.value -%}
Bottom:{%- if product.metafields.global.housingcolour.value -%}{%- endif -%}  {{ product.metafields.my_fields.housing_material_bottom_.value }} {%- endif %} {%- if product.metafields.my_fields.material_stem_.value -%}
Stem:{%- if product.metafields.global.stemcolour.value -%}{%- endif -%}  {{ product.metafields.my_fields.material_stem_.value }} {%- endif %} {%- if product.metafields.global.mount.value -%}
Mounting:{{ product.metafields.global.mount.value }} {%- case product.metafields.global.mount.value -%} {%- when "PCB" -%} (5-pin){%- when "Plate" -%} (3-pin){%- endcase -%}
